sentences: Julia Weldon (born April 22, 1983) is an American indie singer and actor.
Weldon spent most of their childhood living in Demarest, New Jersey.
They attended Demarest Schools, where they played sports, especially softball, and acted.
They graduated from Vassar College in 2005 with a major in Philosophy.
Weldon, a self-taught musician, released their first album, Light is a Ghost, in 2013.
In November 2015, Weldon underwent gender-affirming surgery and unexpectedly fell into a coma for four days, possibly due to meningitis.
They returned to recording in September 2016 with the album Comatose Hope.
